mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from emp e join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no join emp_cg c on e.cg_no = c.cg_no join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where ${param1} like '%${param2}%' order by branch_name asc, dept_name asc, low_dept_name asc

select emp_no, emp_name, branch_name, dept_name, low_dept_name, pic, cg_name, position_name from( select rownum num, emp_no, emp_name, branch_name, dept_name, low_dept_name, pic, cg_name, position_name from emp e join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no join emp_cg c on e.cg_no = c.cg_no join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where ${param3} like '%${param4}%' order by branch_name asc, dept_name asc, low_dept_name asc ) where num between 1 + (${param1} - 1) * ${param2} and ${param2} + (${param1} - 1) * ${param2}
select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') || trim(to_char(to_number(substr(nvl(max(emp_no),'0'), 5,4))+1, '0000')) from emp where emp_no != '99999999'
select position_no, position_name, step from position order by to_number(step) asc
select branch_no, branch_name from branch order by to_number(branch_no) asc
select dept_no, dept_name from dept where branch_no = #{branch_no} order by to_number(dept_no) asc
select low_dept_no, low_dept_name from low_dept where dept_no = #{dept_no} order by to_number(low_dept_no) asc
mapper.insert: insert into emp(emp_no, cg_no, position_no, low_dept_no, emp_break, salary, emp_name, birth, cell_phone, pic, email, emp_tel) values(#{emp_no}, #{cg_no}, #{position_no}, #{low_dept_no}, #{emp_break}, #{salary}, #{emp_name}, #{birth}, #{cell_phone}, null, null, null)
insert into emp_his(emp_no, his_no, cg_no, regdate) values(#{emp_no}, emp_his_seq.nextval, '1', to_char(sysdate, 'yyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: select e.emp_no, branch_name, dept_name, his_no, role_exp, low_dept_name, position_name, emp_name, regdate, ec.cg_name, hc.cg_name as "his_cg_name", role_name from emp e join emp_role er on e.emp_no = er.emp_no join role r on er.role_no = r.role_no join emp_cg ec on e.cg_no = ec.cg_no join emp_his h on e.emp_no = h.emp_no join emp_his_cg hc on h.cg_no = hc.cg_no join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no where e.emp_no = #{emp_no} order by to_date(regdate) desc

select emp_no, emp_name, position_name, low_dept_name, dept_name, branch_name from emp e join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no join emp_cg c on e.cg_no = c.cg_no where e.cg_no = '23' and substr(emp_no, 1,4) != '0000' order by to_number(emp_no) asc

select e.emp_no, salary, emp_name, birth, pic, cell_phone, emp_tel, branch_name, dept_name, position_name, low_dept_name, regdate from emp e join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no join emp_his h on e.emp_no = h.emp_no join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where h.cg_no = '1' and e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
select * from role order by to_number(role_no)
select role_no from emp e join emp_role r on e.emp_no = r.emp_no where position_no = #{position_no} group by role_no having count(role_no) >= 1

select e.emp_no, emp_name, branch_name, dept_name, low_dept_name, position_name, pic, birth, cell_phone, cg_name from emp e join emp_cg c on e.cg_no = c.cg_no join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where e.position_no = #{position_no} order by branch_name asc, dept_name asc, low_dept_name asc
select er.role_no, emp_no, role_name, role_exp from emp_role er join role r on er.role_no = r.role_no where emp_no = #{emp_no} order by to_number(emp_no)

select e.emp_no, cg_name, position_name, low_dept_name, dept_name, branch_name, emp_break, salary, emp_name, birth, pic, email, cell_phone, emp_tel, id, pwd, bank, addr, addr_detail, account, postcode, googleapiid from emp e join emp_detail d on e.emp_no = d.emp_no join emp_cg c on e.cg_no = c.cg_no join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no = l.low_dept_no join position p on e.position_no = p.position_no where e.emp_no = #{emp_no}
